channel.title: Context Engineering Daily - Prompt Engineering
channel.description: Latest Prompt Engineering news in Context Engineering

item.title: AyurParam: A State-of-the-Art Bilingual Language Model for Ayurveda
item.description: arXiv:2511.02374v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Current large language models excel at broad, general-purpose tasks, but consistently underperform when exposed to highly specialized domains that require deep cultural, linguistic, and subject-matter expertise. In particular, traditional medical syst...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> arxiv, LLM, reasoning, model, vision | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: AutoAdv: Automated Adversarial Prompting for Multi-Turn Jailbreaking of Large Language Models
item.description: arXiv:2511.02376v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) remain vulnerable to jailbreaking attacks where adversarial prompts elicit harmful outputs, yet most evaluations focus on single-turn interactions while real-world attacks unfold through adaptive multi-turn conversations. ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> arxiv, framework, LLM, prompting, prompt | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Context-Engineering - "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.
item.description: "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> prompt engineering, prompt, context, context window | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
